A lot of things are less than ideal in the world at the moment, but I can't help but be amazed at what one can do with a static website. 
WebR 
and webR can do. It's never been easier to publish interactive examples, reproducible analyses, and teaching materials that run right in the browser â€” tiny experiments that still feel a little like magic.
